TopicTitle: Stock Space Station with Docking Capabilites

Articles.Content:
Today, I present to you my challenge of docking two spacecraft together using landing gear as the claws and an ncs adapter as the point to latch onto.

One particular problem it seems is that once docked you may only be docked on for a few seconds and time warping seems to make this problem even worse, so you only have to dock once and take a picture/video of it and it does not have to stay on any longer.

Rules:

-Stock parts only gives you extra points for me but all mods are allowed

-You may only do this in 0.16

-You only have to dock once and for a very short amount of time

-mechJEB is allowed but more points for you if you don't use it

-Have fun!

You can learn how to adjust your orbit to rendezvous and dock through this video:

I did this myself, although for some reason I didn't think to record the bit of me actually docking with my satellite. My LP episode 2:

Remember to like, comment and subscribe!

File download for the ships in my video:

http://www./download.php?ua477ah6t7fv46u

http://www./download.php?q2aj2007gm9062h

Post pictures and videos of your attempts in the comments!
